City Council


The City of Yoakum has a Council/Manager form of government with a mayor and four council members. Councilmembers are elected at-large with two-year terms; Mayor and Mayor Pro-Tem are selected by the Council each year. Please call City Hall at 361-293-6321 to contact members by phone. Correspondence may be mailed to PO Box 738, Yoakum, TX. 77995.

  Mayor Carl O'Neill - Place 1
council1@yoakumtx.gov		  Mayor Pro-Tem Tanya Wenzel - Place 3
council3@yoakumtx.gov		    
  Michael Brandt - Place 5
council5@yoakumtx.gov		 Daniel Driskell - Place 2
council2@yoakumtx.gov		 Mitchell Franz - Place 4
council4@yoakumtx.gov
